newsitem.title: FRANCE: HORSE RACING-HELISSIO COASTS TO VICTORY IN ARC.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-HELISSIO COASTS TO VICTORY IN ARC.

text.p: Helissio gave jockey Olivier Peslier his first Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe success with a blistering display at Longchamp on Sunday.
Helissio made all the running in the 12-furlong (2.4-km) race and opened up a commanding lead going into the final 300 metres.
Nothing could live with the three-year-old colt who came home well clear of Pilsudski, the mount of Walter Swinburn, and Irish raider Oscar Schindler, ridden by Cash Asmussen.
The victory was worth 527,000 sterling ($825,000) to winning owner Enrique Sarasola.
